sections.title: Error 0x718
sections.text: Uninstall Faceit/Vanguard, disable antivirus, and restart.

sections.title: Error 0x717
sections.text: Uninstall Faceit/Vanguard, disable antivirus, and restart.

sections.title: Error 0x712
sections.text:
1. Verify Rust files via Steam.
2. Restart PC.
3. Launch Rust to main menu without Fluent.
4. Close Rust and reinject—or contact support.

sections.title: Error 0x757
sections.text:
1. Disable Fast Boot in BIOS.
2. Set UAC to lowest level.
3. Check if 'luafv' is running (`fltmc` in admin CMD); if not, run `sc config luafv start=boot` and `sc start luafv`.
4. Disable antivirus and uninstall Faceit/Vanguard.
5. Restart and reinject—or contact support.
